abstract: Data will include retail sales and import prices for May, Kroger and Smithfield Foods will report earnings and Apple will hold its annual conference.
snippet: Data will include retail sales and import prices for May, Kroger and Smithfield Foods will report earnings and Apple will hold its annual conference.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS Data to be reported this week will include import prices for May (Tuesday); retail sales for May, the Producer Price Index for May and business inventories for April (Wednesday); weekly jobless claims, the Consumer Price Index for May and the current account deficit for the first quarter (Thursday); and industrial production for May and the Thomson Reuters/University of Michigan consumer sentiment index for June (Friday).

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
